gend:
Below are a list of available classes to play as in the UESTRPG 5e game system.

Use `!esrpg class <class>` for an overview of each class and its features:

**Barbarian :axe:**
**Bard :musical_note:**
**Crusader :star2:**
**Mage :mage:**
**Monk :person_in_lotus_position:**
**Necromancer :zombie:**
**Nightblade :ninja:**
**Priest :dolls:**
**Ranger :bow_and_arrow:**
**Rogue :coin:**
**Sorcerer :magic_wand:**
**Spellsword :crossed_swords:**
**Thief :lock_with_ink_pen:**
**Warden :tanabata_tree:**
**Warrior :shield:**

name: Barbarian
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Rage, Unarmored Defense
2    | Reckless Attack, Danger Sense
3    | Primal Path
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Extra Attack, Fast Movement
6    | Primal Path Feature
7    | Feral Instinct
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | Brutal Critical (1 die)
10   | Primal Path Feature
11   | Relentless Rage
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Brutal Critical (2 dice)
14   | Primal Path Feature
15   | Persistent Rage
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Brutal Critical (3 dice)
18   | Indomitable Might
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Primal Champion```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d12 per barbarian level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 12 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points at Higher Levels:** 1d12 (or 7) + your Endurance modifier per barbarian level after 1st
**STARTING PROFICIENCIES:**
**Armor:** Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields
**Weapons:** Axe, Blunt, Hand to Hand, Long Blade, Marksman, Polearm, Short Blade
**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Strength, Endurance
**Skills:** Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- An explorer's pack and four javelins
- (a) any polearm or (b) any long blade
- (a) two handaxes or (b) any short blade

name: Bard :musical_note:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Spellcasting, Bardic Inspiration(d6)
2    | Jack of all Trades,Song of Rest(d6)
3    | Bard College, Expertise
4    | AttributeScore Improvement
5    | Bardic Inspiration (d8), Font of Inspiration
6    | Countercharm, Bard College feature
7    | --
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | Song of Rest (d8)
10   | Bardic Inspiration (d10), Expertise, Magical Secrets
11   | --
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Song of Rest (d10)
14   | Magical Secrets, Bard College Feature
15   | Bardic Inspiration (d12)
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Song of Rest(d12)
18   | Magical Secrets
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Superior Inspiration (d10)```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per bard level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:**8 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your Endurance modifier per bard level after 1st
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light armor
**Weapons:** Long Blades, Marksman, and Short Blades.
**Tools:** Three musical instruments of your choice
**Saving Throws:** Agility, Personality
**Skills:** Choose any three
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- Leather armor and a dagger.
- (a) a rapier or (b) a longsword
- (a) a diplomat's pack or (b) an entertainer's pack
- (a) a lute or (b) any other musical instrument

name: Crusader :star2:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Divine Sense, Lay on Hands
2    | Fighting Style, Spellcasting, Divine Smite
3    | Divine Health, Devotion
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Extra Attack
6    | Aura of Protection
7    | Devotion Feature
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | -- 
10   | Aura of Courage
11   | Improved Divine Strike
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | --
14   | Cleansing Touch
15   | Devotion Feature
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | --
18   | Aura Improvements
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Devotion Feature```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d10 per crusader level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 10 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d10 (or 6) + your Endurance modifier per crusader level after 1st.
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** All Armor, Shield
**Weapons:** All Weapons/n**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Personality, Willpower
**Skills:** Choose two from: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- Chain mail and a holy symbol
- (a) a blade or blunt weapon and a shield or (b) any two weapons
- (a) five javelins or (b) any melee weapon
- (a) a priest's pack or (b) an explorer's pack

name: Mage :mage:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Spellcasting, Magical Focus
2    | Arcane Tradition
3    | Metamagic
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | --
6    | Arcane Tradition Feature
7    | --
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | --
10   | Arcane Tradition Feature
11   | --
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | --
14   | Arcane Tradition Feature
15   | --
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | --
18   | Spell Mastery
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Signature Spells```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Die:** 1d6 per mage level
**Hit points at 1st Level:** 6+ your endurance modifier
**Hit points at Higher Levels:** 1d6 (or 4) + your endurance modifier per mage level after 1st
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** None
**Weapons:** Light crossbows, Short Blade and Staves
**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Intelligence, Willpower
**Skills:** Choose two from: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, and Religion
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- a spellbook
- (a) a quarterstaff or (b) a dagger
- (a) a scholar's pack or (b) an explorer's pack

name: Monk :person_in_lotus_position:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts
2    | Stamina, Unarmored Movement
3    | Monastic Tradition, Deflect Missiles
4    | Attribute Score Improvement, Slowfall
5    | Extra Attack, Stunning Strike
6    | Empowered Strikes, Monastic Tradition Feature
7    | Evasion, Stillness of Mind
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | Unarmored Movement Improvement
10   | Purity of Body
11   | Monastic Tradition Feature
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Tongues of the Soul
14   | Diamond Soul
15   | Timeless Body
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Monastic Tradition Feature
18   | Empty Body
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Perfect Self```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per monk level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 8+ your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your Endurance modifier per monk level after 1st.
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** none
**Weapons:** Bo staff, hand-to-hand, nunchaku quarterstaff, short blades
**Tools:** Choose one type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument.
**Saving Throws:** Strength, Agility
**Skills:** Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- 10 darts
- (a) any quarterstaff or (b) a hand-to-hand weapon
- (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack

name: Necromancer :zombie:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Spellcasting, Death Gleaning
2    | Necromantic Art, Soul Harvest
3    | Soul Strike
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | --
6    | Necromantic Art Feature
7    | --
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | --
10   | Inured to Undeath
11   | --
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | --
14   | Necromantic Art Feature
15   | --
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Transcendence
18   | Necromantic Art Feature
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Reanimate```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per necromancer level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 8+ your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your Endurance modifier per necromancer level after 1st.
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light Armor
**Weapons:** Short Blades, marksman, polearms, and quarterstaffs
**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Endurance, Intelligence
**Skills:** Choose two from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Medicine, Nature, and Religion
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- leather armor
- (a) 2 daggers or (b) a scythe
- (a) a component pouch or (b) an arcane focus
- (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) a priest's pack

name: Nightblade :ninja:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Spellcasting, Path of Darkness
2    | Cunning Action, Shadowhand
3    | Night Eye
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Shadow Step
6    | Path of Darkness Feature
7    | --
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | Magical Ambush
10   | Path of Darkness Feature
11   | Night Magic (6th level)
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Night Magic (7th level), Versatile Trickster
14   | Path of Darkness Feature
15   | Night Magic (8th level)
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Night Magic (9th level)
18   | Spell Thief
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Shade```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per nightblade level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 8 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your Endurance modifier per nightblade level after 1st
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light armor
**Weapons:** Marksman, Short Blade, and Long Blade
**Tools:** Choose one from disguise kit, forgery kit, poisoner's kit or thieves' tools.
**Saving Throws:** Agility, Personality
**Skills:** Choose three from Acrobatics, Arcana, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Investigation, History, Perception, Sleight of Hand, Stealth
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- Leather armor, any bladed weapon, and two daggers
- (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) a long blade
- (a) a burglar's pack, (b) a scholar's pack, or (c) an explorer's pack

name: Priest :dolls:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Spellcasting, Divine Calling
2    | Channel Divinity (1/Rest), Divine Calling Feature
3    | --
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Destroy Undead (CR 1/2)
6    | Channel Divinity (2/Rest), Divine Calling Feature
7    | --
8    | Attribute Score Improvement, Destroy Undead (CR 1), Divine Calling Feature
9    | --
10   | Divine Intervention
11   | Destroy Undead (CR 2)
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | --
14   | Destroy Undead (CR 3)
15   | --
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Destroy Undead (CR 4), Divine Calling Feature
18   | Channel Divinity (3/Rest)
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Divine Intervention Improvement```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per priest level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 8 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your Endurance modifier per priest level after 1st
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light armor, Medium Armor, Shields
**Weapons:** Blunt, Blade, Quarterstaffs
**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Willpower, Personality
**Skills:** Choose two from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- A shield and a holy symbol
- (a) a mace, (b) a quarterstaff, or (c) a warhammer (if proficient)
- (a) scale mail, (b) leather armor, or (c) chain mail (if proficient)
- (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any Blade weapon
- (a) a Priest's Pack or (b) an Explorer's Pack

name: Ranger :bow_and_arrow:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Favored Enemy, Natural Explorer
2    | Fighting Style, Wild Techniques
3    | Primal Instincts, Ranger Archetype
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Extra Attack
6    | Adaptive Hunter, Favored Enemy Improvements, Natural Explorer Improvements
7    | Primal Defense, Ranger Archetype Feature
8    | Attribute Score Improvement, Land’s Stride
9    | Skirmisher’s Stealth
10   | Natural Explorer Improvement, Hide in Plain Sight
11   | Ranger Archetype Feature
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Nature’s Protection
14   | Favored Enemy Improvement, Vanish
15   | Ranger Archetype Feature
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Primal Connection
18   | Feral Senses
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Foe Slayer```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d10 per ranger level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 10 + your Endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d10 (or 6) + your Endurance modifier per ranger level after 1st.
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields
**Weapons:** All Weapons
**Tools:** Herbalism kit
**Saving Throws:** Strength, Agility
**Skills:** Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows
- (a) scale mail or (b) leather armor
- (a) two blade weapons or (b) one axe, blunt, or polearm weapon
- (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack

name: Rogue :coin:
desc:
```Level| Feature
---------------
1    | Expertise, Precise Attacks
2    | Strategic Aid
3    | Roguish Archetype, Tactical Avoidance
4    | Attribute Score Improvement
5    | Extra Attack
6    | Expertise Improvement
7    | Quick Thinking
8    | Attribute Score Improvement
9    | Roguish Archetype Feature
10   | Attribute Score Improvement
11   | Advanced Maneuvers
12   | Attribute Score Improvement
13   | Roguish Archetype Feature
14   | Mental Agility
15   | Slippery Mind
16   | Attribute Score Improvement
17   | Roguish Archetype Feature
18   | Solo Artist
19   | Attribute Score Improvement
20   | Stroke of Luck```

**HIT POINTS**
**Hit Dice:** 1d8 per rogue level
**Hit Points at 1st Level:** 8 + your endurance modifier
**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d8 (or 5) + your endurance modifier
**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Light armor
**Weapons:** Axe, Hand-to-Hand, Marksman, Short Blade
**Tools:* Choose 2 from poisoner's kit, forgery kit, disguise kit, thieves kit, one gaming set of your choice, one musical instrument of your choice.
**Saving Throws:** Agility, Intelligence
**Skills:** Choose four from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- Leather armor, two daggers, and thieves' tools.
- (a) a rapier or (b) a short sword
- (a) a short bow and a quiver of 20 arrows or (b) a short sword
- (a) a burglar's pack, (b) a dungeoneer's pack, or (c) an explorer's pack

**PROFICIENCIES**
**Armor:** Shield
**Weapons:** Blunt, light crossbows, Short Blade
**Tools:** None
**Saving Throws:** Endurance, Willpower
**Skills:** Choose two from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, and Religion
**EQUIPMENT**
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

- Two daggers
- (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any short blade
- (a) a dungeoneer's pack, or (b) an explorer's pack

**Saving Throws:** Agility, Endurance

- (a) a rapier or (b) 4 throwing stars

- (a) a burglar's pack, (b) a dungeoneer's pack, or (c) an explorer's pack

---------------

**Hit Points At higher levels:** 1d10 (or 6) + your endurance modifier per warrior level after 1st.

**Armor:** Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shield
**Weapons:** Axe, Blunt, Blade, Marksman, Pole-arm

- (a) a melee weapon and a shield or (b) two melee weapons

- (a) a dungeoneer's pack, or (b) an explorer's pack
